Civilian1.synopsis: One-line dialog for a female human who is having a nice picnic together with her couple near the windmill.

AD_PicnicCivilians.synopsis: A repeated sequential AD between a couple having a picnic near the windmill. They lovingly banter and tease each other, while occassionally touching on more serious subjects.

Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp.synopsis: When the player convinces the mind flayer to go hunt, and the mind flayer gets into combat (not according to plan), and the mind flayer sees the player, on his turn he will ask for help.
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_ATeleport to S_WYR_Windmill_Point_FrontReCon "oe Windmill_MF_AmbushHunt" and wait for mindflayers turn

AD_Mindflayer_Combat_02.synopsis: A combat AD for the mindflayer it plays when their turn starts.
AD_Mindflayer_Combat_02.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Windmill, get down and attack the mind flayer.

Mindflayer.synopsis: Windmill mindflayer asks player to bring it a corpse to feed on.Speaker 3 is an optional non-illithid player that will briefly be pointed out as potential food in the conversation.

MindflayerKills_AD_Reaction.synopsis: The windmill civilians react to the mindflayer killing a nearby civilian

CeremorphosisResponse_PAD.synopsis: The response of the player after hearing a scream coming from below the windmill
CeremorphosisResponse_PAD.how_to_trigger: Teleport to S_WYR_Windmill_Frontdoor and wait a few seconds

Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer.synopsis: The mindflayer can't find any targets and approaches a nearby player and attacks them.
Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_AReCon: oe Windmill_MF_WaitForPlayerteleport to S_WYR_Windmill_Frontdoor and wait for MF

MindflayerGone_PAD.synopsis: Response of player after player helped mindflayer and notices the mindflayer has left.
MindflayerGone_PAD.how_to_trigger: Teleport to S_WYR_Windmill_MF, finish quest by supplying body, long rest, return to entrance of windmill

Civilian5.synopsis: A one-liner dialog for a civilian near a windmil, standing next to another one, busy in a conversation it seems.

Civilian4.synopsis: A one-liner dialog for a civilian near a windmil, standing next to another one, busy in a conversation it seems.

AD_Mindflayer_Combat_01.synopsis: A combat AD for the mindflayer it plays when their turn starts.
AD_Mindflayer_Combat_01.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Windmill, get down and attack the mind flayer.

Civilian3.synopsis: One-line dialog for a gnome civilian standing alone near the windmill.

AteBrainTooLate_EmperorAD.synopsis: The Emperor is angry that you didn't follow their instructions, and ate the mind flayer brain after helping to feed it.
AteBrainTooLate_EmperorAD.how_to_trigger: BGO_MAIN_ATeleport to S_WYR_Windmill_MF and help the mind flayer feed.Then help the mind flayer or use "oe Windmill_MF_Helped" in ReCon to skip the quest.Kill the mindflayer and have an Illithid character eat the brain

MindflayerDead_EmperorAD.synopsis: Daisy imforms the player that the mindflayer brain should be consumed, if the player kills the mindflayer without speaking with it first.
MindflayerDead_EmperorAD.how_to_trigger: Teleport to S_WYR_Windmill_MF and kill the mindflayer with an Illithid character.

NonIllithidEatsBrain_PAD.synopsis: A non-Illithid player character eats the mind flayer brain and expresses its disgust.(This will only be triggered for Jaheria and Halsin, and possibly any other non-tadpoled playable characters)
NonIllithidEatsBrain_PAD.how_to_trigger: BGO_MAIN_AMove S_WYR_Windmill_MF_Brain to a non-illithid character inventory and use.

Civilian2.synopsis: One-line dialog for a male human who is having a nice picnic together with his partner near the windmill.

CeremorphosisScream_AD.synopsis: As the player approaches the windmill, a scream of pain is heard coming from a cellar below (they will discover soon enough this was the last cry from a person transforming into a mindflayer).

Civilian1_0.speaker: Sloncha Owena
Civilian1_0.text: Umm, can I help you? This is a private picnic.
Civilian1_0.context: NodeContext: Trying to be polite. Her and her partner's picnic being interrupted by the player

Civilian1_1.speaker: Sloncha Owena
Civilian1_1.text: Please, we're not looking for a third wheel. Not today, at least.
Civilian1_1.context: NodeContext: Trying to be polite. Her and her partner's picnic being interrupted by the player

AD_PicnicCivilians_0.speaker: Sloncha Owena
AD_PicnicCivilians_0.text: This was a wonderful idea. Just what we needed.

AD_PicnicCivilians_2.speaker: Bogdan Vortleson
AD_PicnicCivilians_2.text: I thought you might want to get your mind off things. I know I do.
AD_PicnicCivilians_2.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little stress/anxiety about world events.

AD_PicnicCivilians_1.speaker: Sloncha Owena
AD_PicnicCivilians_1.text: True. What with all the refugees, ill rumours, the food shortages...

AD_PicnicCivilians_9.speaker: Sloncha Owena
AD_PicnicCivilians_9.text: Speaking of which, I'm surprised you managed to get such a spread.

AD_PicnicCivilians_8.speaker: Bogdan Vortleson
AD_PicnicCivilians_8.text: Ways and means, dear. Ways and means.

AD_PicnicCivilians_7.speaker: Sloncha Owena
AD_PicnicCivilians_7.text: Did you hear something earlier? Almost like a groan.

AD_PicnicCivilians_5.speaker: Bogdan Vortleson
AD_PicnicCivilians_5.text: Well, we're by a windmill, after all. Probably some cog or joint in need of a little grease.

AD_PicnicCivilians_3.speaker: Sloncha Owena
AD_PicnicCivilians_3.text: Hmm. Speaking of grease, are there any sausage rolls left?

AD_PicnicCivilians_4.speaker: Sloncha Owena
AD_PicnicCivilians_4.text: I think it's been freshened enough times as it is - I can feel my face going flush.

AD_PicnicCivilians_10.speaker: Bogdan Vortleson
AD_PicnicCivilians_10.text: And here was me, thinking you were blushing with happiness to be here with me.

AD_PicnicCivilians_6.speaker: Sloncha Owena
AD_PicnicCivilians_6.text: Oh I see, compliments in return for the picnic, is it? Maybe I'll take that drink after all...

Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_1.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_1.text: Aid me! Help me subdue this meal.

Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_3.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_3.text: No, I won't let you hurt innocent people.

Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_5.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_5.text: Treacherous servant! Then you will share their fate.
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_5.context: InternalNodeContext: "Treacherous servant" is referring to the player

Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_6.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_6.text: Treacherous vessel! You are not worthy of the honour you have been given.
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_6.context: InternalNodeContext: "Treacherous vessel" is referring to the player

Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_0.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_0.text: A worthy ally - you will be exalted by my people.
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_0.context: InternalNodeContext: "worthy ally' is referring to the player

Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_4.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_4.text: A worthy vessel. When your time comes, you will be a fine addition to our people.
Mindflayer_AskPlayerForHelp_4.context: InternalNodeContext: "worthy vessel" is referring to the player

Mindflayer_13.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_13.text: You have done me a service and received appropriate thanks.

Mindflayer_34.speaker: Narrator
Mindflayer_34.text: *Before you lies the unconscious body of a mind flayer, glistening and raw.*

Mindflayer_62.text: Oh but it is. This one has only just transformed. It is weak, vulnerable - its potential ripe for harvesting.

Mindflayer_96.text: Go on. Kill it. Absorb its power.

Mindflayer_114.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sleeping mind flayer wakes up and stands up

Mindflayer_77.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_77.context: NodeContext: Saying "come no closer, you wretch!" but stalls on 'you' because it realises you're not what it thought you were

Mindflayer_37.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_37.text: ...what are you? What am I sensing?

Mindflayer_113.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_113.text: Ah, the trace of illithid power. There is none in your body, but you have been close to it. Touched by it.

Mindflayer_33.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_33.text: You are an ally of my people. A servant, perhaps?

Mindflayer_72.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_72.text: I require an equal: one with the same power flowing through their form.

Mindflayer_17.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_17.text: Return with the one you follow - I will speak to them and no other.

Mindflayer_89.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_89.text: Call it what you will - we are all threads in the fabric of the Grand Design.

Mindflayer_27.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_27.text: But I require an equal. Return with the one you follow. I shall speak with them.

Mindflayer_84.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_84.text: Insolent lackey! You will be my very first meal.

Mindflayer_25.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_25.text: Ah, you again. I have all I need, I require neither your services nor your master's.

Mindflayer_35.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_35.text: You are like me - like I was - a vessel, yet to transform.

Mindflayer_24.text: This one is newly changed. Its body is weak, its potential ripe for harvesting.

Mindflayer_53.text: Go on. Kill it. Absorb its power.

Mindflayer_76.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_76.text: Help me. I am so hungry.

Mindflayer_97.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_97.text: We are new to our collective. Our - my birth was difficult. The vessel fought hard. It left me weak.

Mindflayer_115.text: A newborn. Vulnerable, its potential ripe for harvesting.

Mindflayer_94.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_94.text: Was it you I heard screaming when I entered the windmill?

Mindflayer_39.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_39.text: My vessel. He fought the transformation - he found it excoriating.

Mindflayer_22.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_22.text: I can still taste his terror. It is delicious, but will not sustain me.

Mindflayer_68.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_68.text: We need to feed. We need a brain, fresh and frantic, to restore our strength.

Mindflayer_101.text: Go on. Kill it. Absorb its power.

Mindflayer_118.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_118.text: I'll see what I can do.

Mindflayer_54.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_54.text: I can fetch you a corpse, freshly killed. Brain intact.

Mindflayer_80.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_80.text: I shall be here, waiting for your return.

Mindflayer_52.text: Curtail your sympathy. We wish to destroy the elder brain, not nourish its thralls.

Mindflayer_14.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_14.text: I sense you are under-developed. Bring me a brain and I will help you augment yourself.

Mindflayer_42.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_42.text: Offer the mind flayer the body you're carrying.

Mindflayer_31.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_31.text: Go find your own meal! Even weakened you're more powerful than anything out there.

Mindflayer_57.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_57.text: You are correct. I am ready.
Mindflayer_57.context: NodeContext: Starting to believe in itself.

Mindflayer_20.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_20.text: I cannot risk this body. I have heard the call - we will all be needed for what is to come.

Mindflayer_6.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_6.text: I'm not going to bring you food.

Mindflayer_21.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_21.text: Very well, kin, I shall dine on you.

Mindflayer_32.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_32.text: You would betray us? Then you shall be our very first meal.

Mindflayer_88.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_88.text: Be swift kin. I need your aid.

Mindflayer_67.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_67.text: You return. You look stronger as I grow only weaker.

Mindflayer_64.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_64.text: Will you help me? I am still weak after my transformation. Still hungry.

Mindflayer_104.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_104.text: So loud... Why are you - you...
Mindflayer_104.context: NodeContext: saying "why are you shouting" but stalls on the "you" as it realised the player is something different, strange

Mindflayer_83.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_83.text: Attack the creature before it wakes up.

Mindflayer_112.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_112.text: What? No - I've had so little time!

Mindflayer_99.speaker: Narrator
Mindflayer_99.text: *You pick your way silently through the loose rocks and broken masonry until you're a safe distance away.*

Mindflayer_10.speaker: Narrator
Mindflayer_10.text: *You try to pick your way silently through the loose rocks and broken masonry, but to no avail.*

Mindflayer_73.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_73.text: Who is there? Who shall be my first meal?

Mindflayer_44.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_44.text: You return. Will you aid me?

Mindflayer_60.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_60.text: You approach me again. And again I tell you, I require someone blessed with an illithid passenger.

Mindflayer_47.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_47.text: But no matter, I desire solitude. Leave me.

Mindflayer_117.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_117.text: You have returned. With a meal, I hope.

Mindflayer_49.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_49.text: Offer the mind flayer the body you're carrying.

Mindflayer_116.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_116.text: And as you have aided me, so I shall aid you.

Mindflayer_61.speaker: Narrator
Mindflayer_61.text: *You feel its presence gently probing the palace of your mind. As it finds a mostly-vacant spot, power and knowledge flood your brain, unlocking a new secret.*

Mindflayer_107.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_107.text: Take this. I have no use for such baubles now. It may aid you.

Mindflayer_2.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_2.text: Now leave. I will feed alone.

Mindflayer_40.speaker: Player
Mindflayer_40.text: Not yet - I just need a little more time.

Mindflayer_16.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_16.text: Be quick. Time is on no one's side.

MindflayerKills_AD_Reaction_0.speaker: Sloncha Owena, Bogdan Vortleson, Tonsure Bellagio, Jenniver Antilles, Spargo Ovilliers

CeremorphosisResponse_PAD_0.speaker: Player
CeremorphosisResponse_PAD_0.text: Someone's in agony. Coming from beneath the windmill.

Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_3.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_3.text: There is nothing here! Not a single creature with a mind worth feeding on. Except...

Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_1.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_1.text: I am sure you have given much to help my people, but if I am to survive, you will be required to give more.
Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_1.context: NodeContext: Mindflayer is going to eat the player

Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_0.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_0.text: Sometimes for one to survive, another must perish. And as you have yet to mature to your true form, my survival takes precedent.
Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_0.context: NodeContext: Mindflayer is going to eat the player

Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_2.speaker: Mind Flayer
Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_2.text: There is no shame in feeling fear. You will only taste the sweeter for it.
Mindflayer_WaitForPlayer_2.context: NodeContext: Mindflayer is going to eat the player

MindflayerGone_PAD_0.speaker: Player
MindflayerGone_PAD_0.text: The mind flayer is gone. This could spell trouble...

Civilian5_0.speaker: Spargo Ovilliers
Civilian5_0.text: Didn't you hear me the first time?

Civilian5_1.speaker: Spargo Ovilliers
Civilian5_1.text: Let me have a little peace and quiet, won't you?

Civilian4_0.speaker: Jenniver Antilles
Civilian4_0.text: I said I can't talk. On you go.

Civilian3_0.speaker: Tonsure Bellagio
Civilian3_0.text: I used to be scared of the windmill when I was a nipper - thought it was like a big giant flailing its arms at me.

Civilian3_1.speaker: Tonsure Bellagio
Civilian3_1.text: Quite a spot, eh? Knocks the breath out of me to get up here, but the views are worth it.

AteBrainTooLate_EmperorAD_0.text: It's no good - it won't be any use now. It's overripened thanks to your feeding.

MindflayerDead_EmperorAD_1.text: Interesting - the creature was born recently, its mind is still fresh. You can absorb its potential if you consume it.

MindflayerDead_EmperorAD_0.text: Just like the tadpoles you've already encountered.

Civilian2_0.speaker: Bogdan Vortleson
Civilian2_0.text: Fine day for it, eh? Got to enjoy things while they last, I suppose...

Civilian2_1.speaker: Bogdan Vortleson
Civilian2_1.text: You couldn't give us a bit of space, could you? We don't get much time alone together.
